The MEME Suite

Motif-based sequence analysis tools

chen2meme

Usage:

chen2meme [options]

Description

Read a CHEN matrix file and convert to MEME format. You may concatenate files for more than one motif.

Input

Reads concatenated CHEN files from standard input.

Concatenated CHEN files describe one or more motifs. Each motif has a header line and a position-weight matrix.

Sample Input
>NANOG
2       64      4       10
1       66      1       12
52      1       0       27
0       0       0       80
0       0       0       80
0       5       74      1
3       1       1       75
3       49      14      14
57      9       0       14
1       0       3       76
1       3       46      30
4       48      12      16
30      16      3       31
31      12      19      18
41      12      12      15
16      20      12      32
>OCT4

168     10      1       160
1       6       2       330

68      93      37      141

0       0       319     20
